description:
沪江英乐：美国人气阳光小正太Austin Mahone活力新单《What About Love》。Austin在MV中大展舞技，而动感的歌曲也应该可以俘获一批新的粉丝吧，嘻哈文化永垂不朽。曲风很轻狂，反应了Austin Mahone对爱情的渴望~~

【Austin Mahone活力新单《What About Love》】

歌词：

[Verse 1]
I-I'm feeling your thunder
The storm's getting closer
This rain is like fire
And my-my world's going under
And I can't remember
The reason that you got off the line

[Bridge]
You're moving on, you say
Here I stay
I'll take this pain
Yeah, I can't, I can't

[Chorus]
But what about love?
What about our promises?
What about love?
You take it off and leave me nothing
What about love?
What about us 'til we end?
What about love?
You cut my wings, now I am falling
What about love? (x2)

[Verse 2]
Why are you colder than winter?
You're switching the picture
You used to be perfect, yeah (yeah)
Once you're hot like the summer
But suddenly remember
The reason that you said bye bye bye

[Bridge]
You're moving on, you say
Here I stay
I'll take this pain
Yeah, I can't, I can't

[Chorus]
But what about love?
What about our promises?
What about love?
You take it off and leave me nothing
What about love?
What about us 'til we end?
What about love?
You cut my wings, now I am falling
What about love? (x2)

[Middle 8 - x4]
Uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh
What about-what about love?

[Bridge]
You're moving on, you say
Here I stay
Watching every night get colder
You're moving on, you say
Here I stay
I'll take this pain
Yeah, I can't, I can't

[Chorus]
But what about love?
What about our promises?
What about love?
You take it off and leave me nothing
What about love?
What about us 'til we end?
What about love?
You cut my wings, now I am falling
What about love? (x2)

[End]
What about-what about
What about love?
What about-what about
What about love?

  • 猫咪的秘密生活：你不在家时猫咪都在做什么？
